socket_extension package¶

this module is used to communicate with the server.

socket_extension.client module¶

class socket_extension.client.client(address, port)¶

Bases: object

This is a class used to connect to the server

Parameters

  • address (string) – the ip address of the server

  • port (int) – the port that the server is listening on

close_client()¶

close connection

listen_from_server()¶

read data from server

send_data(data)¶

send data to server

Parameters

data (string) – data to be sent to the server

socket_extension.dataHelper module¶

class socket_extension.dataHelper.dataHelper¶

Bases: object

this is a class desined to generate data sent to the server side

valid_QR(decode)¶

create validation data for blur tooth

Parameters

decode (string) – the string decoded from the QRcode

Returns

the data that will be sent via socket

Return type

string

create validation data for blur tooth

Parameters

string – the mac address read by the bluetooth

Returns

the data that will be sent via socket
